mapper.select: SELECT SERV_ID, STATUS, AMOUNT, RATIO FROM CRD_SERV_PAY WHERE SERV_ID =#{servId}

SELECT PAY_DATE,AMOUNT,VAT, TRUNC((AMOUNT-VAT)*((RATIO)/100)) AS RATIO,SUPPLY_PAYMENT FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAY_DATE ,AMOUNT ,TRUNC(AMOUNT*((VAT)/100)) AS VAT ,RATIO,SUPPLY_PAYMENT FROM CRD_SERV_SUGG SUGG, CRD_SERV_APP APP, CRD_SERV_PAY PAY WHERE SUGG.SERV_ID = APP.SERV_ID AND APP.SERV_ID = PAY.SERV_ID AND MEM_ID =#{memId} AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y' AND PROGRESS_CODE = 'STU0060001' AND END_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} ||' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} ||' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY END_DATE ASC ) UNION ALL SELECT '합계' AS PAY_DATE,SUM(AMOUNT),SUM(VAT), SUM(TRUNC((AMOUNT-VAT)*((RATIO)/100))) AS RATIO,SUM(SUPPLY_PAYMENT ) FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAY_DATE ,AMOUNT ,TRUNC(AMOUNT*((VAT)/100)) AS VAT ,RATIO,SUPPLY_PAYMENT FROM CRD_SERV_SUGG SUGG, CRD_SERV_APP APP, CRD_SERV_PAY PAY WHERE SUGG.SERV_ID = APP.SERV_ID AND APP.SERV_ID = PAY.SERV_ID AND MEM_ID =#{memId} AND CHOOSE_YN = 'Y' AND PROGRESS_CODE = 'STU0060001' AND END_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} ||' 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} ||' 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.sql: SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL -1),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)

SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{startMonth},'YYYY-MM'),LEVEL-1),'YYYY-MM' )AS DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=CEIL(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#{endMonth},'YYYY-MM'),TO_DATE(#{startMonth},'YYYY-MM') ))+1
